display_long_description:
GCVR RELOADED
The best VR firearm simulator just got a whole lot better. Full audio remastering for every weapon, massively enhanced textures and lighting, and remodeled ranges makes this the most realistic and accurate version of Gun Club ever. With over 100 weapons and counting, as well as interactive ranges, sideshows & the unlimited freedom of sandbox mode, there has never been a better time to hit the range.

STRIKING REALISM
Highly detailed & fully interactive weapon models. Developed on real-world ballistics, you can handle, load, cock & fire these weapons. Flick the safety, select burst or full auto, extend the stock or rack the slide to clear a round

UPGRADE & CUSTOMISE
Unlock 100s of attachments & weapon upgrades. Stocks & scopes, extended mags & laser sights, even grenade launchers: customise your weapons to fit any scenario

PROGRESSION
Earn cash & rankings based on your performance. Hundreds of events including hostage rescue & sniper scenarios to the zombie apocalypse
